title.narrative: Evidence Synthesis for Policy Fund - Research

description.narrative: This activity (Evidence Synthesis for Policy Fund - Research) is a component of Policy Relevant Evidence Products (PREP) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £735,116. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development, DAI Europe, Ernst & Young, IMC Worldwide, Overseas Development Institute, Oxford Policy Management, University of Leeds. The start date is 20-05-2014 and the end date is 30-11-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
